Mit der Zeit lernt er, sich anzupassen und um sein Überleben in dieser fremden Welt zu kämpfen. Doch eines Tages wird Soo Ho genauso plötzlich wieder auf die Erde zurückgeholt, wie er auf dem neuen Planeten gelandet ist. Schnell erfährt er, dass eine Rückkehr zu seinem vergangenen Leben nicht möglich ist, denn die Erde befindet sich in einem ständigen Kampf mit Monstern, denen es gelungen ist, den Planeten zu infiltrieren. But luckily, he's got magic that's quite literally off the charts!\n\n---\n**Links:**\n- Alternative Official English - [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10050/episode/322262) (U.S. Only), [Kodansha](https://kodansha.us/series/am-i-actually-the-strongest/)","es-la":"Un chico renace en otro mundo para tener una vida pacífica. Apesar de ter nascido na realeza, devido a sua magica parecer fraca, seus pais o abandonaram sem pensar em uma floresta para ser devorado por monstros. Contudo sua magia é desumanamente poderosa. O que ele devera fazer para obter a vida pacifica que ele tanto deseja?\n\nHikikomori (引き篭り) é um termo que significa literalmente isolado em casa, ele é usado para referir-se a pessoas que apresentam graves níveis de isolamento, normalmente são jovens entre 13 e 39 anos que muitas vezes são sustentados pelos pais ou trabalham online. Osamu Tezuka, who had made his debut in the magazine alongside the great prewar mangaka, poured his extraordinary energy and ideas into the new stage of the magazine---and he was not afraid to show them off. \n\nSince its publication, it has never been collected, and its existence was unknown among fans and researchers alike, with the exception of a few, so you can only read this fantastic gem, \"Yajiuma March\" (93 pages) here!\n\nContents:\nYajiuma March\" Serialized from September 1970-February 1971 issues of \"Second Grader\" (Shogakusei Ninnen).\n\nA very unique slapstick comedy depicting the surrealistic upheaval caused by a human-horse hybrid, Umataro of Yaji's House!"},"links":{"amz":"https://www.amazon.co.jp/%E5%AE%8C%E5%85%A8%E9%99%90%E5%AE%9A%E7%89%88-%E3%82%84%E3%81%98%E3%81%86%E3%81%BE%E3%83%9E%E3%83%BC%E3%83%81-%E6%89%8B%E5%A1%9A%E6%B2%BB%E8%99%AB%E5%AD%A6%E5%B9%B4%E8%AA%8C%E5%82%91%E4%BD%9C%E9%9B%86-%E5%BE%A9%E5%88%BB%E5%90%8D%E4%BD%9C%E6%BC%AB%E7%94%BB%E3%82%B7%E3%83%AA%E3%83%BC%E3%82%BA-%E6%89%8B%E5%A1%9A-%E6%B2%BB%E8%99%AB/dp/477803323X","cdj":"https://www.cdjapan.co.jp/product/NEOBK-2324977","raw":"https://www.fukkan.com/fk/CartSearchDetail?i_no=68326876"},"originalLanguage":"ja","publicationDemographic":"shounen","contentRating":"safe","tags":[{"id":"3de8c75d-8ee3-48ff-98ee-e20a65c86451","name":{"en":"Animals"}},{"id":"4d32cc48-9f00-4cca-9b5a-a839f0764984","name":{"en":"Comedy"}},{"id":"69964a64-2f90-4d33-beeb-f3ed2875eb4c","name":{"en":"Sports"}},{"id":"b9af3a63-f058-46de-a9a0-e0c13906197a","name":{"en":"Drama"}},{"id":"caaa44eb-cd40-4177-b930-79d3ef2afe87","name":{"en":"School Life"}},{"id":"da2d50ca-3018-4cc0-ac7a-6b7d472a29ea","name":{"en":"Delinquents"}},{"id":"e5301a23-ebd9-49dd-a0cb-2add944c7fe9","name":{"en":"Slice of Life"}}]}

Demək olar ki, bütün canlılar məhv oldu, qalan bütün torpaqlar tək bir sahilə çevrildi. Çox uzun zaman dilimləri ərzində həsas həyat forması olan yeni bir irq yarandı; insan şəklini alan ölməz zinət əşyaları. 957a54aa-b37c-4136-9e95-34f47dce188f:::||@!@||:::2023-11-01T10:00:00:::||@!@||:::{"id":"957a54aa-b37c-4136-9e95-34f47dce188f","title":{"en":"Showa: A History of Japan"},"altTitles":[{"en":"A Comics History of the Showa Era"},{"ja-ro":"Comic Showashi"},{"ja":"コミック昭和史"},{"ja":"昭和史"},{"ja-ro":"Showashi"},{"en":"Showa Era History"}],"lastChapter":"120","relatedIdds":["4c1fce47-9d04-4c0c-a25c-30e068a0f60e","7328c8ff-9c64-4b22-b2ca-e092f9b9c62f"],"description":{"en":"From Drawn \u0026 Quarterly:\n\nShowa: A History of Japan is a work of Shigeru Mizuki's meticulously researched historical portrait of twentieth-century Japan. This series deals with the period leading up to World War II, a time of high unemployment and other economic hardships caused by the Great Depression. Mizuki's photo-realist style effortlessly brings to life the Japan of the 1920s and 1930s, depicting bustling city streets and abandoned graveyards with equal ease.\nWhen the Showa era began, Mizuki himself was just a few years old, so his earliest memories coincide with the earliest events of the time. With his trusty narrator Rat Man, Mizuki brings history into the realm of the personal, making it palatable, and indeed compelling, for young audiences as well as more mature readers. As he describes the militarization that leads up to World War II, Mizuki's stance toward war is thoughtful and often downright critical―his portrayal of the Nanjing Massacre clearly paints the incident  as an atrocity. Mizuki's Showa is a beautifully told history that tracks how technological developments and the country's shifting economic stability had a role in shaping Japan's foreign policy in the early twentieth century.\n\n[Official English](https://drawnandquarterly.com/books/showa-1926-1939/)\n\n---\n- **Won the 13th Kodansha Manga Award for Seinen/General in 961bfe78-48e6-4701-ab9d-db117fadef05:::||@!@||:::2023-11-01T10:00:00:::||@!@||:::{"id":"961bfe78-48e6-4701-ab9d-db117fadef05","title":{"en":"Mitsuteru Yokoyama Rare Collection: 1956-57"},"altTitles":[{"ja":"横山光輝レア・コレクション: 1956-57"}],"lastChapter":"5","description":{"en":"A collection of rare masterpieces by masters rich in variety!\n\nMitsuteru Yokoyama, who made his spectacular debut with ``Soundless Sword`` published by Tokodo in Osaka in March 1955, was published as a separate supplement to Kobunsha's monthly magazine ``Shonen``. After publishing works such as Osamu Tezuka's ``Golden City``, he moved to Tokyo and began serializing in Kobunsha's ``Shoujo`` and other publications. From the June 1956 issue of Shonen, one of his masterpieces, ``Gigantor``, began serialization. It cements his status as a popular manga artist. For this project, we have selected Yokoyama's masterpieces from among the works he published in magazines from 1956 to 1957, focusing on works that have not been included in books. Included works are ``Kogarashi Daisuke``, ``Ranch Chorus``, ``Yuhime-sama and Yuki-chan``, ``Angel with Two Faces``, and ``The Man from Texas``."},"originalLanguage":"ja","publicationDemographic":"shounen","contentRating":"safe"}

964dd663-dc57-4f06-a9f7-643db42050e8:::||@!@||:::2023-11-01T10:00:00:::||@!@||:::{"id":"964dd663-dc57-4f06-a9f7-643db42050e8","title":{"en":"Kirisame ga Furu Mori"},"altTitles":[{"en":"Forest of Drizzling Rain"},{"ja":"霧雨が降る森"},{"ru":"Лес моросящего дождя"},{"th":"อาถรรพ์ป่าต้องสาป"},{"zh":"雾雨飘散之森"},{"pt-br":"Floresta chuvosa"}],"lastChapter":"18","availableTranslatedLanguages":["ru","pt-br","en","es","de"],"description":{"en":"After the sudden death of her parents, a young woman named Shiori Kanzaki find a picture of a man that she believes to be her grandfather, and travels to Azaka Village, where he was apparently from, in hopes of meeting him. However, when she arrives she instead finds that the tiny village has a museum that she realizes she lived in as a young girl. There she meets Sakuma, a middle school girl who tends to get herself in trouble, and Suga, the strange manager of the museum who only communicates in written memos. Suga grudgingly allows her to stay at the museum for awhile and research her family. But there is a legend in the village of \"Kotori Obake\", a demon woman who abducts children who go into the nearby forest. How is this story connected to Shiori's past, and why does she hear voices calling her, commanding her to \"Come fulfill the promise\"?   \n  \nAdapted from the game of the same name.","pt":"Depois da morte repentina de seus pais, uma jovem garota chamada Shiori Kanzaki encontrou uma foto de um homem que acredita ser o seu avô, e viaja até a vila Azakawa, que era, aparentemente, sua terra natal, na esperança de o encontrar. Entretanto, quando chega, ao invés, ela descobre que a pequena vila tem um prédio de arquivos e percebe que viveu lá quando era mais nova. Ali, ela conhece Sakuma, uma garota da escola secundária que tende a se meter em prolemas, e Suga, o estranho dono do prédio que só se comunica via notas. Suga permite que ela fique no prédio por um tempo e pesquise sobre sua família. Mas tem uma lenda na vila sobre a \"Kotoriobake\", uma mulher demónio que abduz as crianças que chegam perto da floresta. Como essa história está conectada com o passado de Shiori e porque ela escuta vozes a chamado, dizendo que \"venha cumprir a promessa\"?","pt-br":"Após a morte súbita de seus pais, uma jovem chamada Shiori Kanzaki encontra uma foto de um homem que ela acredita ser seu avô, e viaja para a aldeia Azakawa, de onde ele aparentemente era, na esperança de conhecê-lo. No entanto, quando chega, ela descobre que a pequena aldeia tem um museu que ela percebe que viveu lá quando era mais jovem. Lá ela conhece Sakuma, uma garota do ensino médio que tende a se meter em problemas, e Suga, o estranho gerente do museu que só se comunica em memorandos escritos. But the world she lives in is in fact the world of an otome game. And what's more, she wakes up to find the story of the game is now 20 years after the original ending of the game! With her country in turmoil and the original heroine of the story, Anne Rose, turning out to be a spy, Fioria sets out to right these injustices and give payback to the ones who have wronged her! He plumbs the dissolute depths of human psychology, literally bathing his characters in expansive shadows that paradoxically reveal as much as they obscure. A young man catches a cold after being soaked in the rain and is tended to by his grandmother. He drifts, dreaming of a train trip with an older brother he doesn't have. A traveling salesman comes across a boy lying in the middle of the road and stops to have a cigarette and tell a story that drifts through memories of faces and places, before settling back on the traveling salesman and the boy pretending to not look at the stars. A young woman walks along the river with her bicycle and a friend who is nothing more than a disembodied head, discussing past times together, memories they have of each other."},"links":{"amz":"https://www.amazon.co.jp/%E3%83%9E%E3%83%83%E3%83%81%E4%B8%80%E6%9C%AC%E3%81%AE%E8%A9%B1-%E9%88%B4%E6%9C%A8-%E7%BF%81%E4%BA%8C/dp/4892891061","engtl":"https://drawnandquarterly.com/books/single-match/","mu":"47039"},"originalLanguage":"ja","publicationDemographic":"seinen","contentRating":"safe","tags":[{"id":"256c8bd9-4904-4360-bf4f-508a76d67183","name":{"en":"Sci-Fi"}},{"id":"33771934-028e-4cb3-8744-691e866a923e","name":{"en":"Historical"}},{"id":"3b60b75c-a2d7-4860-ab56-05f391bb889c","name":{"en":"Psychological"}},{"id":"4d32cc48-9f00-4cca-9b5a-a839f0764984","name":{"en":"Comedy"}},{"id":"51d83883-4103-437c-b4b1-731cb73d786c","name":{"en":"Anthology"}},{"id":"ac72833b-c4e9-4878-b9db-6c8a4a99444a","name":{"en":"Military"}},{"id":"b1e97889-25b4-4258-b28b-cd7f4d28ea9b","name":{"en":"Philosophical"}},{"id":"b9af3a63-f058-46de-a9a0-e0c13906197a","name":{"en":"Drama"}},{"id":"caaa44eb-cd40-4177-b930-79d3ef2afe87","name":{"en":"School Life"}},{"id":"e5301a23-ebd9-49dd-a0cb-2add944c7fe9","name":{"en":"Slice of Life"}},{"id":"e64f6742-c834-471d-8d72-dd51fc02b835","name":{"en":"Aliens"}},{"id":"ee968100-4191-4968-93d3-f82d72be7e46","name":{"en":"Mystery"}},{"id":"f8f62932-27da-4fe4-8ee1-6779a8c5edba","name":{"en":"Tragedy"}}]}

96c6a3f2-d2f4-4918-ad11-c9613027505f:::||@!@||:::2023-11-01T10:00:00:::||@!@||:::{"id":"96c6a3f2-d2f4-4918-ad11-c9613027505f","title":{"en":"Kyoumei Suru Echo"},"altTitles":[{"en":"Asymmetry"},{"ja-ro":"Kyoumeisuru Echo"},{"en":"Lonesome Echo"},{"en":"Resounding Echo"},{"ja":"共鳴するエコー"}],"lastChapter":"6.5","availableTranslatedLanguages":["en","it","pt-br"],"relatedIds":["0a52218a-076e-4201-9a12-a6f5a662e8eb"],"description":{"en":"Kyoumei Suru Echo is a collection of shorts from Tsubomi magazine, that are intertwined by mutual acquaintance but otherwise don't intersect. Included are the stories Kyoumei Suru Echo ('Lonesome Echo'), Runner's High, Unbalance, and Asymmetry.","pt-br":"Kyoumei suru Echo é uma compilação de seis histórias individuais, sem o menor envolvimento entre si - com exceção de Lonesome Echo, que possui três partes. No mangá, as personagens se conhecem e/ou estudam na mesma escola, mas não há nenhum envolvimento relacionado aos acontecimentos.\n\nRunner's High: A história é sobre uma garota que se arrepende de algo que fez no passado e por conta disso, não consegue encarar de frente a pessoa envolvida. (Aqui a Capitã do clube de corrida aparece em Unbalance).\n\nUnbalance: É sobre a presidente do conselho estudantil que faz sua amiga usar uma peruca para relembrar os tempos em que ela tinha cabelos grandes e fazer uma brincadeira com uma das alunas do conselho. (A tal aluna do conselho aparece em Asymmetry).\n\nAsymmetry: Fala a respeito de duas irmãs gêmeas que, apesar de serem idênticas, tem personalidades completamente diferentes.\n\nLonesome Echo: Oneshot em três partes que conta sobre Ritsuko, uma professora de música que larga a sua antiga escola por motivos desconhecidos e que conhece uma aluna hábil no violino que diz ser \"uma exceção\" naquele lugar. As duas criam um belo laço de amizade, até que o passado -não tão distante- de Ritsuko volta para atormentá-la."},"links":{"al":"56592","amz":"https://www.amazon.co.jp/dp/B00IWNBF4W","ap":"kyoumei-suru-echo","kt":"20090","mal":"26592","mu":"61068"},"originalLanguage":"ja","contentRating":"safe","tags":[{"id":"423e2eae-a7a2-4a8b-ac03-a8351462d71d","name":{"en":"Romance"}},{"id":"a3c67850-4684-404e-9b7f-c69850ee5da6","name":{"en":"Girls' Love"}},{"id":"b9af3a63-f058-46de-a9a0-e0c13906197a","name":{"en":"Drama"}}]}

One day, his school is enveloped in light, and he is suddenly transported to another world called Tilunog.\n\nSome students who believe they can become heroes with cheat skills are excited about the transfer to the otherworld. However, a beautiful woman from Tilunog named Philia cruelly informs them that they were summoned to be sacrificed, and that they are destined to be killed.\n\nThus begins a storm of massacre and humiliation by demons, called the \"Chaos Banquet\" begins! 97206be4-19ea-4f5d-90a1-1db1bcaa7d7f:::||@!@||:::2023-11-01T10:00:00:::||@!@||:::{"id":"97206be4-19ea-4f5d-90a1-1db1bcaa7d7f","title":{"en":"Koi wa Maiorita"},"altTitles":[{"en":"Love Came Dancing Down"},{"ja":"恋は舞い降りた"}],"lastChapter":"5","availableTranslatedLanguages":["en","pl"],"relatedIdds":["fc6e4ca2-6b93-48d8-a757-8d442fd92959"],"description":{"en":"1: Love Came Dancing Down + Extra  \nEven before he was born it had been decided that the heir of the Haku Family, Reion, would be betrothed to the youngest child of the Koku Family, Kaen. For his coming-of-age and wedding ceremony, Reion visits the House of the Koku Family. However, Reion was no longer the boy he first saw in pictures, but a man overflowing with confidence. Furthermore, Reion left the words \"I am as appalled as you are about this wedding between two men.\" - Blissful Sin  \n  \n2: Oriental Gorgeous Legend - First Story  \nA young boy from the Sei family, the land neighboring Koku, wanders into the Forbidden Forest and discovers an injured man lying in the flowers. Both strangers are shocked at the appearance of the other - the young Sei boy, Renju, with violet eyes and black hair and the platinum-haired Katsuragi with sharp facial features. The two strike up an unlikely friendship, and Renju discovers that he is a rare person who can cross a barrier that surrounds the forest. The ancestors of the two families had feuded since long ago… but can Renju and Katsuragi endure the obstacles and keep their friendship?  \n  \n3: Oriental Gorgeous Legend - Second Story + Extra  \nAfter catching a cold while waiting for Katsuragi and recovering on Katsuragi's side of the barrier, Renju's grandfather forbids him to leave the manor but soon collapses from the stress. Renju's uncle returns to see how the two of them are doing, and ends up explaining everything to Renju… a complicated past that Renju and Katsuragi share. When Katsuragi suddenly appears on Renju's side, things become even more complicated. Will the two finally be able to stay together?  \n  \n4: Story of Love + Extra  \nShion, Reion's older brother, suddenly became the head of the Koku family when their eldest brother died. But for him, there was only one thing he wanted: to bring his old bodyguard Gii back to his side. Things take a bad turn when Gii refuses violently… but it seems that Shion might have a bit of a masochistic streak?  \n  \n5: Flaw of Paradise + Extra  \nWhen Shou's house was attacked by rebels, he watched his father be killed in front of his eyes… by the hand of his trusted companion Nachi. From that moment, Shou spent his days betrayed and raped in a small room, locked away from the world. His paradise had been taken away by the man he trusted the most.","pl":"Już przed jego samymi narodzinami zostało zadecydowane, że dziedzic rodziny Haku, Reion, zostanie zaręczony z najmłodszą latoroślą z rodziny Koku, Kaenem. Gdy Kaen jest już w odpowiednim wieku do zawarcia małżeństwa, Reion odwiedza dom rodziny Koku. Jednakże, Reion już nie jest tym samym chłopcem, którego zobaczył na zdjęciu, ale mężczyzną o niezwykłej pewności siebie. Co więcej, wypowiada do niego te słowa: \"Jestem zbulwersowany tak samo jak i Ty, tym małżeństwem między dwoma mężczyznami\". However, the raid goes awry when his party is effortlessly decimated by the Demon King’s overwhelming power.\n\nBut death is not the end of the road for Alexander, as he is reincarnated two years later as that very same Demon King’s son. Her miserable life seemed to get worse and worse, however… Her life changed when the duke came back alive.\n\n“Madam, how do you like it?”\n“You have enough luxury to buy some residences in the capital.”\n“…no one will be able to look down on you anymore.”\n\nKind servants and the empire’s devoted and murderous duke. Pada tahun dia menjadi dewasa, dia dikirim untuk menikahi adipati hantu yang dikabarkan sudah mati. Kehidupannya yang menyedihkan tampaknya semakin memburuk, namun ... Hidupnya berubah ketika sang duke kembali hidup-hidup. \"Nyonya, bagaimana Anda menyukainya?\" Pelayan yang baik hati, \"Kamu memiliki cukup kemewahan untuk membeli beberapa tempat tinggal di ibukota.\" “… tidak ada yang bisa memandang rendahmu lagi.” Dan adipati kekaisaran yang setia dan pembunuh. Sudah terlambat bagi mereka yang menyiksa Laritte untuk menyesalinya.","ko":"\"공작가와 결혼해라, 라리트 브루마이어.\"\n\n천대받고 구박받는 인생인 백작가의 사생아 라리트.\n그녀는 태생부터 고귀한 이복언니를 대신하여,\n전쟁터에서 죽어버린 유령 공작가에 시집가게 된다.\n\n다만, 라인하라트 공작가는 반역죄로 인해 모든 재산이 압류되었으며,\n대신 신부로 가게 된 라리트가 향한 곳은 황실의 넒은 아량으로\n남겨진 외딴 산속에 있는 낡은 별장이다.\n\n하지만 평생 눈칫밥만 먹던 라리트에게 결혼은 절호의 기회!\n지긋지긋한 집을 떠나 드디어 생긴 나만의 집!\n\n창창한 홀로서기 라이프가 시작되나 싶었지만,\n늦은 밤, 죽은 줄 알았던 남편이 살아 돌아오는데...?\n\n웹소설 \u003c백작가의 사생아 결혼하면\u003e 웹툰화☆"},"links":{"ap":"when-the-counts-illegitimate-daughter-gets-married","engtl":"https://tapas.io/series/my-unexpected-marriage/info","mal":"148364","mu":"196691","nu":"when-the-counts-illegitimate-daughter-gets-married","raw":"https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=58777646"},"originalLanguage":"ko","contentRating":"safe","tags":[{"id":"3e2b8dae-350e-4ab8-a8ce-016e844b9f0d","name":{"en":"Long Strip"}},{"id":"423e2eae-a7a2-4a8b-ac03-a8351462d71d","name":{"en":"Romance"}},{"id":"b9af3a63-f058-46de-a9a0-e0c13906197a","name":{"en":"Drama"}},{"id":"cdc58593-87dd-415e-bbc0-2ec27bf404cc","name":{"en":"Fantasy"}},{"id":"e197df38-d0e7-43b5-9b09-2842d0c326dd","name":{"en":"Web Comic"}},{"id":"e5301a23-ebd9-49dd-a0cb-2add944c7fe9","name":{"en":"Slice of Life"}},{"id":"f4122d1c-3b44-44d0-9936-ff7502c39ad3","name":{"en":"Adaptation"}},{"id":"f5ba408b-0e7a-484d-8d49-4e9125ac96de","name":{"en":"Full Color"}}]}
